currentRow.columnValue: The drug reservoir holds liquid pain-killer supplied by the hospital pharmacy and loaded in to the PCA pump by the clinician.
The pump shall be able to deliver basal infusion at flows throughout the basal infusion flow range of Fbasal min = 1 to Fbasal max = 10 ml/hr.
A real-time clock must produce timestamps accurate to 10 ms.

The drug library102 can be thought of as a lookup table that, given a drug name and a location, provides typical and safe limits of different infusion parameters. The drug library shall be determined by an authorized and authenticated hospital pharmacist
The PCA pump shall resume prescribed infusion upon receiving an authenticated command through its ICE interface.
Prescriptions that violate the soft limits of the drug in the drug library shall issue a visible and audible warning requiring a soft limit confirmation by the clinician.
The PCA pump shall measure drug , F(basal) flow within a tolerance of Fmdf tol = 0.1 ml/hr.
